members.name: percent_terms_to_match
members.description: How many terms have to match in order to consider the document a match (default: 0.3)

members.name: min_term_freq
members.description: The term frequency as percent: terms with lower occurence in the source document will be ignored

members.name: max_query_terms
members.description: The maximum query terms to be included in the generated query

members.name: stop_words
members.description: A list of stop words to be ignored

members.name: min_doc_freq
members.description: The word occurrence frequency as count: words with lower occurrence in the corpus will be ignored

members.name: min_word_len
members.description: The minimum value of word length

members.name: max_word_len
members.description: The maximum value of word length

members.name: boost_terms
members.description: The word occurrence frequency as count: words with higher occurrence in the corpus will be ignored

members.name: boost
members.description: the boost value for the current query

members.name: analyzer
members.description: The analyzer to use for the query string

members.name: fail_on_unsupported_field
members.description: True if fail on unsupported field
